titleStmt.title: SII 12.194: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 194. (A.R. No. 455 of 1921). ON THE INNER WALL OF THE GŌPURA (RIGHT OF ENTRANCE) IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription, also dated in the 16th year, registers a similar gift of 20 cows by Ēḻiśai[nā*]daṉ Jīnattaraiyaṉ of Marudūr, to provide daily 5 nāḻi of milk, as measured by the standard measure Arumoḻidēva-nāḻi, for the sacred bath of the god Āṭkoṇḍadēva at Tiruveṇṇainallūr, a brahmadēya in Tirumuṉaippāḍi Tiruveṇṇainallūr-nāḍu in Rājādhirāja-vaḷanāḍu.
The village Marudūr may be identified with one of the two village of the same name in the Tirukkoyilur taluk.
According to the astronomical details, the date of the record is A.D. 1258, April 8, Monday.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu patiṉāṟāva
tu meṣa nāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣa ttu tri tiyaiyun tiṅkaṭkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa ro hiṇinā ḷirācaā dhi rā
cavaḷanāṭṭut tirumuṉaippāṭit tiruveṇṇainallūrnāṭṭu brahmadeya nti ruveṇṇai
nallūr Uṭaiyār Āṭkoṇṭatevaṟku pālāṭiyaruḷa marutūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻicainā
taṉ ciṉattaraiyaṉ viṭṭa pāṟpacu 2 10 pacu Irupatum Iṉṉāyaṉār curapimaṉṟāṭikaḷil kalai
yaṉ cūṟṟi tiruvakampaṭikkoṉ kaikkoṇṭu nāḷoṉṟukku Arumoḻitevaṉāḻi
yāl Aḷakkum pāl 5� pāl Aiññāḻiyum cantrā tittavarai yaḷakka kaṭavanā ka kai
kkoṇṭāṉ . yitu panmāheśvara ra kṣai
Digital edition of SII 12.194 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
